Package GamePackage

Class Player

java.lang.Object
GamePackage.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This class stores the player's features, their plan, interests, points and rewards.
See Also:

    • changePlan

      public Plan changePlan()
      This method returns the player's personal_plan, but it creates a new Plan object if it's null.
      Returns:
      it returns the player's plan, or the newly created one.

    • changePlan

      public void changePlan(Plan plan)
      This method assigns the player's personal_plan.
      Parameters:
      plan - is a Plan object.

    • getLogin

      public String getLogin()
      It is sometimes necessary to get the player's login from the player, for example when the player wants to change some information, a new player is created in the PlayerSetup class and the login needs to be gotten from somewhere to assign it, and this is the place.
      Returns:
      the login

    • getGender

      public String getGender(Object c)
      This method is to get the player's rewards.
      Parameters:
      c - random object, which is not used, but is needed to differentiate between this method and getGender().
